item.description:
Join us for a delicious afternoon tea at the elegant Park Plaza Hotel. Tea is $29.50 + tax/tip. This is a delightful way to spend a Sunday afternoon in the summer. Enjoy the hotel's special tea experiences and relax with an assortment of savory and sweet delicacies that are unique to The Boston Park Plaza Hotel & Towers.

Please look for us in Pairings Restaurant inside the hotel. If you have trouble finding us, please call Catherine at 774 232 0000. Please only sign up if you can definitely attend as space is limited for this event. Please note: the Hotel is changing its name, so it may already have the new name of Highgate Hotel outside.
item.how_to_find_us: Please look for us in Pairings Restaurant inside the hotel. If you have trouble finding us, please call Catherine at 774 232 0000.
item.name: Join Us for Sunday Afternoon Tea at the Boston Park Plaza (Highgate) Hotel
